answers.answer: Hi,There can be many causes for his symptoms like neuropathy due to diabetes, alcohol, arthritis, muscular dystrophies, motor neuron disease, myopathy, subacute combined degeneration of spinal cord, bed rest, medications and chronic infections. It is important to know the complete medical history and results on tests in order to pin point the right diagnosis.It will also help us to know if a muscle biopsy has been done and if yes then any positive findings were there.
